Text:
warning, the audio quality is horrible.

the mp3 files are in 256 kbps but it sounds like they are rips of a internet radio station at under 46 kbps, only encoded in 256 kbps for some reason. so not only do they sound bad, they waste space.
hm, I don't understand the other comment because I downloaded this and the files sound perfect... and it was cheaper than buying it on itunes!
